IncidentDef.label: psychic shriek
IncidentDef.letterText: Threatened anima forest released a terrifying shriek in the local area, disorienting all creatures. Colonists will become dazed for several hours.

IncidentDef.label: animal insanity pulse
IncidentDef.letterText: The Anima forest feeling threatened has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven all nearby animals mad.

IncidentDef.label: exposed ore deposit
IncidentDef.letterText: In order to reward you for living in harmony with the forest, the mystic roots have pushed some valuable resources to the surface.

IncidentDef.label: anima soothe
IncidentDef.letterText: In order to reward you for living in harmony with the forest, anima forest released a smooth psychic soothe, making your colonists euphoric.

IncidentDef.label: healroot sprout
IncidentDef.letterText: In order to reward you for living in harmony with the forest, a {PLANT_label} has sprouted nearby. It can regularly be harvested to gain herbal medicine.
